We<S>3870</S> then<S>1161</S>, as workers together<S>4903</S> with him, beseech<S>3870</S> you also<S>2532</S> that ye<S>5209</S> receive<S>1209</S> not<S>3361</S> the grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S> in<S>1519</S> vain<S>2756</S>.
(For<S>1063</S> he saith<S>3004</S>, I have heard<S>1873</S> thee<S>4675</S> in a time<S>2540</S> accepted<S>1184</S>, and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the day<S>2250</S> of salvation<S>4991</S> have I succoured<S>997</S> thee<S>4671</S>: behold<S>2400</S>, now<S>3568</S> is the accepted<S>2144</S> time<S>2540</S>; behold<S>2400</S>, now<S>3568</S> is the day<S>2250</S> of salvation<S>4991</S>.)
Giving<S>1325</S> no<S>3367</S> offence<S>4349</S> in<S>1722</S> any thing<S>3367</S>, that<S>3363</S> the ministry<S>1248</S> be<S>3469</S> not<S>3363</S> blamed<S>3469</S>:
But<S>235</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> things approving<S>4921</S> ourselves<S>1438</S> as<S>5613</S> the ministers<S>1249</S> of God<S>2316</S>, in<S>1722</S> much<S>4183</S> patience<S>5281</S>, in<S>1722</S> afflictions<S>2347</S>, in<S>1722</S> necessities<S>318</S>, in<S>1722</S> distresses<S>4730</S>, <sup>approving: Gr. commending</sup>
In<S>1722</S> stripes<S>4127</S>, in<S>1722</S> imprisonments<S>5438</S>, in<S>1722</S> tumults<S>181</S>, in<S>1722</S> labours<S>2873</S>, in<S>1722</S> watchings<S>70</S>, in<S>1722</S> fastings<S>3521</S>; <sup>in tumults: or, in tossings to and fro</sup>
By<S>1722</S> pureness<S>54</S>, by<S>1722</S> knowledge<S>1108</S>, by<S>1722</S> longsuffering<S>3115</S>, by<S>1722</S> kindness<S>5544</S>, by<S>1722</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, by<S>1722</S> love<S>26</S> unfeigned<S>505</S>,
By<S>1722</S> the word<S>3056</S> of truth<S>225</S>, by<S>1722</S> the power<S>1411</S> of God<S>2316</S>, by<S>1223</S> the armour<S>3696</S> of righteousness<S>1343</S> on the right hand<S>1188</S> and<S>2532</S> on the left<S>710</S>,
By<S>1223</S> honour<S>1391</S> and<S>2532</S> dishonour<S>819</S>, by<S>1223</S> evil report<S>1426</S> and<S>2532</S> good report<S>2162</S>: as<S>5613</S> deceivers<S>4108</S>, and<S>2532</S> yet true<S>227</S>;
As<S>5613</S> unknown<S>50</S>, and<S>2532</S> yet well known<S>1921</S>; as<S>5613</S> dying<S>599</S>, and<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, we live<S>2198</S>; as<S>5613</S> chastened<S>3811</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> killed<S>2289</S>;
As<S>5613</S> sorrowful<S>3076</S>, yet<S>1161</S> alway<S>104</S> rejoicing<S>5463</S>; as<S>5613</S> poor<S>4434</S>, yet<S>1161</S> making<S>4148</S> many<S>4183</S> rich<S>4148</S>; as<S>5613</S> having<S>2192</S> nothing<S>3367</S>, and<S>2532</S> yet possessing<S>2722</S> all things<S>3956</S>.
O ye Corinthians<S>2881</S>, our<S>2257</S> mouth<S>4750</S> is open<S>455</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, our<S>2257</S> heart<S>2588</S> is enlarged<S>4115</S>.
Ye are<S>4729</S> not<S>3756</S> straitened<S>4729</S> in<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S>, but<S>1161</S> ye are straitened<S>4729</S> in<S>1722</S> your own<S>5216</S> bowels<S>4698</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> for a recompence<S>489</S> in the same<S>846</S>, (I speak<S>3004</S> as<S>5613</S> unto my children<S>5043</S>,) be<S>4115</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> enlarged<S>4115</S>.
Be ye<S>1096</S> not<S>3361</S> unequally yoked together<S>2086</S> with unbelievers<S>571</S>: for<S>1063</S> what<S>5101</S> fellowship<S>3352</S> hath righteousness<S>1343</S> with<S>2532</S> unrighteousness<S>458</S>? and<S>1161</S> what<S>5101</S> communion<S>2842</S> hath light<S>5457</S> with<S>4314</S> darkness<S>4655</S>?
And<S>1161</S> what<S>5101</S> concord<S>4857</S> hath Christ<S>5547</S> with<S>4314</S> Belial<S>955</S>? or<S>2228</S> what<S>5101</S> part<S>3310</S> hath he that believeth<S>4103</S> with<S>3326</S> an infidel<S>571</S>?
And<S>1161</S> what<S>5101</S> agreement<S>4783</S> hath the temple<S>3485</S> of God<S>2316</S> with<S>3326</S> idols<S>1497</S>? for<S>1063</S> ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> the temple<S>3485</S> of the living<S>2198</S> God<S>2316</S>; as<S>2531</S> God<S>2316</S> hath said<S>2036</S>,<S>3754</S> I will dwell<S>1774</S> in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> walk in<S>1704</S> them; and<S>2532</S> I will be<S>2071</S> their<S>846</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> they<S>846</S> shall be<S>2071</S> my<S>3427</S> people<S>2992</S>.
Wherefore<S>1352</S> come out<S>1831</S> from<S>1537</S> among<S>3319</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> be ye separate<S>873</S>, saith<S>3004</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, and<S>2532</S> touch<S>680</S> not<S>3361</S> the unclean<S>169</S> thing; and<S>2504</S> I will receive<S>1523</S> you<S>5209</S>,
And<S>2532</S> will be<S>2071</S> <S>1519</S> a Father<S>3962</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> shall be<S>2071</S> my<S>3427</S> sons<S>5207</S> <S>1519</S> and<S>2532</S> daughters<S>2364</S>, saith<S>3004</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Almighty<S>3841</S>.
